paragraph.paragraph: To evaluate a metric over a scope:

list.item: Select the object you want to evaluate the metric on (a feature, a class or a cluster. System is compulsory the running one).

Select the scope type from the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/60_metric_tool/metric_toolbar.xml scope combo box (you can either choose the scope type of the previously selected object or a greater scope type in the sense of the following order relation: feature < class < cluster < system < archive).
120 420 /images/eiffelstudio/metrics_png/scopecombobox.png 0
Note: If you choose "Archive" as scope type, a dialog will ask for opening an archive file to compute the metric over. Select then an archive file.

Select a metric from the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/60_metric_tool/metric_toolbar.xml metric menu .
282 504 /images/eiffelstudio/metrics_png/metricmenu.png 0

paragraph.paragraph: The measure is displayed in the provided text field below commands, see red rectangle in the following example:

In some cases, you can get more information about the evaluated metric. See
40_viewing_measure_details.xml detailing a measure .
paragraph.note: Note: - Scope type list is either shrunk or extended regarding selected object (only greater scope types appear). - All metrics are not available for any scope type.
paragraph.warning: Caution: When calculated, a measure is not saved yet!
